A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie could have been so much better. The characters were difficult for me to care about and there were so many unnecessary additions including Rose and the camel-dog-horses arc of the story. It felt like the movie was trying really hard to inject today's politics into the movie. I just wanted to see lightsabers\, space battles\, and learn how the Jedi would carry on. To me\, Rogue One was 10X better in just about every way. See that one instead.
